### Question 2
```{r}
grades |>
  summarise(min(Exam, na.rm = TRUE), max(Exam, na.rm = TRUE), mean(Exam,na.rm = TRUE),n()) |>
  knitr::kable()
```

### Question 3
```{r}
student_missing <- sum(is.na(grades$Exam))
```
There are `student_missing` students that did not take the final exam.
